definition: an event marking a unique or important historical change of course or one on which important developments depend
details:
noun
- an event marking a unique or important historical change of course or one on which important developments depend
= example: an event marking a unique or important historical change of course or one on which important developments depend
= synonyms: turning point
- the entire geographical area drained by a river and its tributaries
= synonyms: basin
- a ridge of land that separates two adjacent river systems
= synonyms: water parting, divide
